bug.author: gniwon
bug.summary: The location of the propeller is moved.
bug.description:
I am using my default model(BP_FlyingPawn), and recently I found that the propellers would shift a little after a long flight. What is the problem? Is there solution? <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13757890/59813917-54be4a80-934e-11e9-853c-7b4f431e0a60.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13757890/59813921-5720a480-934e-11e9-9ced-8b2a3d61630d.png></denchmark-link>
8129x8129 size Landscape

comments.comment: I noticed the same issue. Mine shifted 45 degree after a long run, and started to block my camera. Any fix?

Closed due to incompleteness. Please feel free to open a new issue if you still have this problem, and include the following (as requested when opening a bug issue) *Make sure to write all reproduction steps *Include full error message in text form *Search issues for error message before filing issue *Attach screenshot if applicable *Include code to run if applicable Thanks!
